title: Soredemo Ayumu wa Yosetekuru
synopsis: On a whim, first-year Ayumu Tanaka quits the Kendo Club to join the illegitimate Shogi Club. Urushi Yaotome, the president of the club and a master of shogi, is thrilled to finally have a playing partner. As Ayumu's upperclassman, Urushi endeavors to be his shogi mentor and student role model. Too often, however, she finds herself blushing with embarrassment! Stone-faced and honest, Ayumu sees no issue with calling Urushi "cute." Although Ayumu likes her, he refrains from confessing and promises himself to first beat her in a game of shogi.
staff: [['Minato, Mirai', ['Director']], ['Yamamoto, Souichirou', ['Original Creator']], ['Mieno, Hitomi', ['Series Composition']], ['Hirata, Kazuya', ['Character Design']]]
